Payee_Salary_TaxObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Payee_Salary_TaxObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Payee_Salary_TaxObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Payee_Salary_Tax_Data.description: Reference ID for the tax election. Submit the Payroll_Payee_Tax_Data_ID.

WorkerObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

WorkerObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

WorkerObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Payee_Salary_Tax_Data.description: The worker the salary tax data applies to.

CompanyObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

CompanyObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

CompanyObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Payee_Salary_Tax_Data.description: The company the salary tax data applies to.
The date when the salary tax data becomes effective.
Set to true to exempt a worker from salary tax calculations.

Company_Salary_Tax_SectorObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Company_Salary_Tax_SectorObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Company_Salary_Tax_SectorObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Payee_Salary_Tax_Data.description: For companies with multiple tax sectors. Submit the activity that applies to the worker. Doesn't apply to exempted workers.

description: The data that should be entered into the system for a Payee Salary Tax record.

validation.validation: Leave the Activity Sector blank when selecting Exempted to Salary Tax.
Submit only 1 tax election for salary tax for the worker [worker] in company [company] for the effective date [date].
Submit a company that is valid for Worker [worker] as of [date].
Submit a worker that's an employee.
[worker] doesn't have a French pay group. Submit a tax election effective date for a period when the worker has a pay group assignment for France.
You can't update your own information.
Submit a tax sector configured for the company [company] as of [effective date].
